text: Haverfordwest Rugby Football Club is a rugby union team from the town of Haverfordwest, West Wales. The club is a member of the Welsh Rugby Union and is a feeder club for the Llanelli Scarlets. ==Club badge== The club badge depicts a phoenix rising from the ashes. This represents the teams reformation after the club was disbanded during World War I. ==Club honours== * WRU Division Three West, 2010-11 - Champions ==Notable former players== * Peter Morgan (4 caps) * Richard Summers (1 cap) * Rob Evans (19 caps*) ==External links== *Haverfordwest RFC Official club site. ==References== Category:Rugby clubs established in 1875 Category:Welsh rugby union teams Category:Sport in Pembrokeshire Category:Haverfordwest
title: Haverfordwest RFC
